item.title: How to "go get" Behind a Proxy
item.description:
Proxy for “go get”

https_proxy=http://user:pass@proxy_host:port go get ...

Proxy for Git

In $HOME/.gitconfig:

[https]
	proxy = proxy_url

Proxy for Mercurial

In $HOME/.hgrc:

[http_proxy]
host = host:port
user = ...
passwd = ...
